titleStmt.title: A medicine for the times, or, An antidote against faction written by T.J.
titleStmt.author: Jordan, Thomas, 1612?-1685?

notesStmt.note: "Containing these cures, viz.: 1. How to cure a man that hath a factious Spirit. 2. How to cure a woman so possessed. 3. A new and direct experiment, to know the Kings-Evil. 4. How to cure one that is troubled with crosses. 5. A cure for him that is troubled with an Ovall-pate (in English) a Round-head. 6. A brief Definition of a disease call'd obstinacie. 7. A cure for his Impatience, that is angry with me for this slender expression of my Art."
Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
